bool V_BOOL (Value v)
 Converts a Value to a bool. Result is false if Value is V_NIL, otherwise true.

Typedef Documentation

typedef struct _VALUE* Value
 

Fake struct for Value typechecking.

This is just fakery so the compiler will do int vs. Value typechecking/overloading for us. Values are really ints. If you get a compiler error regarding the nonexistent struct _VALUE, you've probably passed an int where a Value was required, or vice versa.

Allocates a new Binary object.

  • cls Value of the object's class slot.

void *    pData,
int    size
) 
 

Allocates a new Binary object with the given data.

  • cls Value of the object's class slot.
  • pData Pointer to data to copy into the object.
  • size The size of the data, in bytes.

Value NewArray (  Value    cls,
int    nSlots
) 
 

Allocates a new Array object.

The slots will be initialized to V_NIL.

  • cls Value of the object's class slot.
  • nSlots Number of slots.

Value NewArray (  int    nSlots ) 
 

Allocates a new Array object of class Array.

The class slot will be initialized to Array. The slots will be initialized to V_NIL.

  • nSlots Number of slots.
